mapper.select: SELECT inoutRec ,mainBusinessCode ,memberId ,memberName ,inoutRegDate ,contractorDevision ,inoutTradeDate ,inoutName ,inoutPrice ,inoutPreDate ,inoutCategory ,inoutMemo ,inoutCheck ,inoutLast ,inoutResult FROM k3_tb_inout where inoutRec = #{inoutRec};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k3_tb_inout ( inoutRec, mainBusinessCode, memberId, memberName, inoutRegDate, contractorDevision, inoutTradeDate, inoutName, inoutPrice, inoutPreDate, inoutCategory, inoutMemo, inoutCheck, inoutLast, inoutResult ) VALUES ( #{inoutRec}, #{mainBusinessCode}, #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{inoutRegDate}, #{contractorDevision}, #{inoutTradeDate}, #{inoutName}, #{inoutPrice}, #{inoutPreDate}, #{inoutCategory}, #{inoutMemo}, #{inoutCheck}, #{inoutLast}, #{inoutResult} );
